% https://q.uiver.app/#
\[\begin{tikzcd}
	{T^{2}Dj_{1}} &&&& {T^{2}Dj_{2}} \\
	&& {T^{2}\ell} \\
	\\
	&& \ell
	\arrow[from=1-1, to=1-5]
	\arrow["{T^{2}\lambda_{j_{1}}}"', from=1-1, to=2-3]
	\arrow["{T^{2}\lambda_{j_{2}}}", from=1-5, to=2-3]
	\arrow["{\lambda_{j_{1}} \circ \gamma_{Dj_{1}} \circ \mu_{Dj_{1}}}"', curve={height=18pt}, from=1-1, to=4-3]
	\arrow["{\lambda_{j_{2}} \circ \gamma_{Dj_{2}} \circ \mu_{Dj_{2}}}", curve={height=-18pt}, from=1-5, to=4-3]
	\arrow["{\alpha \circ \mu_{\ell}}"', curve={height=6pt}, dashed, from=2-3, to=4-3]
	\arrow["{\alpha \circ T\alpha}", curve={height=-6pt}, dashed, from=2-3, to=4-3]
\end{tikzcd}\]
